title: Remove leaving the game report
body: Some People like me must leave because work or something more important than Gameplay! REMOVE LEAVING THE GAME REPORT.

replies.body: don't play a game if you don't have time to finish it...
Especially with things as predictable as work.
Like seriously, get your head out of the game an hour before you have to leave or something.
So you start up a game when you work in 15 minutes? Lol this is your own fault. Let me just ruin the game for 9 others because I don't know how to tell time.
If you know you have to work... why did you start the game? The report is in there for people who rage quit as well.
